metadata.titleEn: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network: automatic weather station of desert station, 2022
metadata.titleCn: 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网：荒漠站自动气象站（2022）
metadata.description:
This dataset includes data recorded by the Heihe integrated observatory network obtained from the automatic weather station (AWS) at the desert station from January 1 to December 31, 2022. The site (100.9872°E, 42.1135°N) was located on a desert surface in the desert, which is near Ejin Banner, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region. The elevation is 1054 m. The installation heights and orientations of different sensors and measured quantities were as follows: air temperature and humidity profile (HMP45AC; 5 and 10 m, north), wind speed profile (010C; 5 and 10 m, north), wind direction (020C, 10m), air pressure (CS100; 2 m), rain gauge (TE525M; 10 m), four-component radiometer (CNR1; 6 m, south), two infrared temperature sensors (SI-111; 6 m, south, vertically downward), soil heat flux (HFP01; 3 duplicates, -0.06 m), soil temperature profile (109ss-L; 0, -0.02, -0.04, -0.1, -0.2, -0.4, -0.6, -1.0 m), soil moisture profile (ML3; -0.02, -0.04, -0.1, -0.2, -0.4, -0.6, -1.0 m).
The observations included the following: air temperature and humidity (Ta_5 m and Ta_10 m; RH_5 m and RH_10 m) (℃ and %, respectively), wind speed (Ws_5 m and Ws_10 m) (m/s), wind direction (WD_10 m) (°), air pressure (press) (hpa), precipitation (rain) (mm), four-component radiation (DR, incoming shortwave radiation; UR, outgoing shortwave radiation; DLR_Cor, incoming longwave radiation; ULR_Cor, outgoing longwave radiation; Rn, net radiation) (W/m^2), infrared temperature (IRT_1 and IRT_2) (℃), soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2, and Gs_3) (W/m^2), soil temperature (Ts_0 cm, Ts_2 cm, Ts_4 cm, Ts_10 cm, Ts_20 cm, Ts_40 cm, Ts_60 cm, Ts_100 cm) (℃), soil moisture (Ms_2 cm, Ms_4 cm, Ms_10 cm, Ms_20 cm, Ms_40 cm, Ms_60 cm, Ms_100 cm) (%).
The data processing and quality control steps were as follows: (1) The AWS data were averaged over intervals of 10 min for a total of 144 records per day. The missing data were denoted by -6999. (2) Data in duplicate records were rejected. (3) Unphysical data were rejected. (4) The data marked in red are problematic data. (5) The format of the date and time was unified, and the date and time were collected in the same column, for example, date and time: 2022-6-10 10:30. (6) Finally, the naming convention was AWS+ site no. Moreover, suspicious data were marked in red.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2022年1月1日至2022年12月31日黑河流域地表过程综合观测网下游荒漠站气象要素观测数据。站点位于内蒙古额济纳旗荒漠滩，下垫面是红砂荒漠。观测点的经纬度是100.9872E, 42.1135N，海拔1054m。空气温度、相对湿度传感器架设在5m、10m处，朝向正北；气压计安装防水箱内；翻斗式雨量计安装在10m处；风速传感器架设在5m、10m处，风向传感器架设在10m处，朝向正北；四分量辐射仪安装在6m处，朝向正南；两个红外温度计安装在6m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤温度探头埋设在地表0cm和地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、60cm和100cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；土壤水分传感器分别埋设在地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、60cm和100cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；土壤热流板（3块）依次埋设在地下6cm处。
观测项目有：空气温湿度（Ta_5m、RH_5m、Ta_10m、RH_10m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、风速（WS_5m、WS_10m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_10m）(单位：度)、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）(单位：瓦/平方米)、地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_60cm、Ms_100cm）(单位：体积含水量，百分比)和土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_60cm、Ts_100cm）（单位：摄氏度）。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2022-6-10 10:30；（6）命名规则为：AWS+站点名称
黑河综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区大约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是其经济发展的基础，尤其是在中国西部，自古以来就一直是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持着中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠地区被先前的研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，保持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频繁发生，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013），阿拉尔海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集，包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，风速和风向的梯度；空气压力、降水和土壤湿度剖面）通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期进行观测，同时也记录了地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the data collection method for hydrometeorological data involve the use of automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period?
Verification.QuestionCn: 水文气象数据的收集方法是否涉及使用具有10分钟平均周期的自动气象站？

Verification.QuestionEn: Are soil temperature and moisture profiles part of the observational datasets collected in oasis–desert systems?
Verification.QuestionCn: 土壤温度和湿度剖面是收集在绿洲-沙漠系统中的观测数据集的一部分吗？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the key elements that a dataset in an oasis–desert system should include to support sustainable development research?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中支持可持续发展研究的数据集应包括哪些关键要素？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes, hydrometeorological data, vegetation and soil parameters
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 能量、水汽、碳和甲烷通量、水文气象数据、植被和土壤参数

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are automatic weather stations typically placed to collect data in arid and semi-arid regions, and what kind of data do they gather?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 自动气象站通常放置在干旱和半干旱地区的什么地方以收集数据，它们收集什么样的数据？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with data collection in arid and semi-arid inland river basins, and how can long-term datasets contribute to addressing these challenges?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域，数据收集面临哪些挑战，以及长期数据集如何有助于解决这些挑战？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used for monitoring energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于监测绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used in oasis–desert ecosystems involves the use of an eddy covariance system and scintillometer to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data. This is supplemented by hydrometeorological data from automatic weather stations, which include radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles, observed with a 10-minute average period.
Example.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，数据收集方法的一个例子是使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪来获取半小时的湍流通量数据。这些数据通过自动气象站的水文气象数据进行补充，包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面，观测周期为10分钟平均值。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in collecting data in arid and semiarid inland river basins?
Example.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域收集数据时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge faced in such regions is the ecological environment degradation, including the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms, as observed in river basins like the Tarim River basin and the Aral Sea basin.
Example.AnswerCn: 在这些地区面临的一个挑战是生态环境退化，包括河流和湖泊的干涸、自然植被的退化、土地沙漠化的加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴，这在塔里木河流域和咸海流域中得到了体现。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific features measured by an automatic weather station in arid regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 自动气象站在干旱地区测量的具体特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: air temperature, relative humidity at multiple heights, air pressure, precipitation, wind speed and direction, radiation components, surface radiation temperature, soil heat flux, soil moisture, soil temperature at various depths
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 空气温度，不同高度的相对湿度，气压，降水，风速和风向，辐射分量，地表辐射温度，土壤热通量，土壤湿度，不同深度的土壤温度

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of data collection methods used to ensure data quality in meteorological observations?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 确保气象观测数据质量的数据收集方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: fixed number of data points per day, specific placeholder for missing data, removal of duplicate records, filtering out data outside physical or instrumental limits, marking questionable data in red
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 每天固定数量的数据点，特定的占位符用于缺失数据，删除重复记录，过滤掉超出物理或仪器限制的数据，用红色标记可疑数据。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the typical properties of datasets that track energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert systems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 跟踪绿洲-沙漠系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据集的典型属性是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: long-term data collection, half-hourly turbulent flux data, auxiliary hydrometeorological data, profiles of soil and vegetation parameters, collected from multiple meteorological stations
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 长期数据收集、半小时湍流通量数据、辅助水文气象数据、土壤和植被参数剖面，来自多个气象站。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many automatic weather stations are involved in collecting hydrometeorological data in the oasis–desert ecosystems?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，有多少个自动气象站参与收集水文气象数据？

Quantification.QuestionEn: Over how many years were the energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes datasets collected in the oasis–desert systems?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，能量、水蒸气和碳通量数据集的收集持续了多少年？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is an automatic weather station and how is it used in the context of data collection for meteorological studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 自动气象站是什么，它在气象研究的数据收集中如何使用？
Definition.AnswerEn: An automatic weather station is a facility used to observe and record meteorological data, often including parameters like air temperature, humidity, wind speed, wind direction, precipitation, and radiation. In meteorological studies, such as those conducted at the Heihe River Basin, these stations are equipped with sensors positioned at various heights and orientations to ensure precise data collection, which can then be processed for quality control and analysis.
Definition.AnswerCn: 自动气象站是一种用于观察和记录气象数据的设施，通常包括空气温度、湿度、风速、风向、降水量和辐射等参数。在气象研究中，例如在黑河流域进行的研究，这些站点配备了不同高度和方向的传感器，以确保精确的数据收集，这些数据随后可以进行质量控制和分析。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does the term 'eddy covariance system' mean in the context of measuring energy and carbon exchange in ecosystems?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在测量生态系统中的能量和碳交换时，“涡度协方差系统”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of measuring energy and carbon exchange in ecosystems, an 'eddy covariance system' refers to a technique used to measure and calculate the vertical turbulent fluxes within the atmosphere. It is commonly used to assess exchanges of water vapor, carbon dioxide, and energy between the land surface and the atmosphere, providing critical data for understanding ecosystem dynamics, especially in oasis-desert systems.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在测量生态系统中的能量和碳交换的背景下，“涡度协方差系统”指的是一种用于测量和计算大气中垂直湍流通量的技术。它通常用于评估水蒸气、二氧化碳和能量在陆地表面与大气之间的交换，为理解生态系统动态提供了关键数据，特别是在绿洲-沙漠系统中。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods used in the 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网 compare to the observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems in terms of frequency and variety of parameters measured?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网使用的数据收集方法与人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集在测量频率和参数种类方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网 employs a 10-minute observation frequency and measures a wide range of parameters including air temperature, humidity, pressure, precipitation, wind speed, soil moisture, and temperature profiles. In contrast, the observational datasets from oasis–desert systems include half-hourly turbulent flux data, energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes, and auxiliary data such as hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网采用10分钟观测频率，测量包括气温、湿度、气压、降水、风速、土壤湿度和温度剖面等多种参数。相比之下，绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集包括半小时的湍流通量数据、能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及辅助数据，如水文气象、植被和土壤参数。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in ensuring the quality and consistency of long-term data collection in oasis-desert ecosystems, and how are these addressed in data processing protocols?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 确保在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中长期数据收集的质量和一致性可能面临的挑战有哪些，以及这些挑战在数据处理协议中是如何解决的？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in data quality and consistency include dealing with missing data, removing duplicates, and filtering out values that exceed physical or instrumental limits. These challenges are addressed by marking missing data with specific codes, ensuring uniform date and time formats, and conducting regular quality checks to flag questionable data.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据质量和一致性面临的挑战包括处理缺失数据、去除重复数据以及过滤超出物理或仪器限制的值。这些挑战通过用特定代码标记缺失数据、确保日期和时间格式统一，以及定期进行质量检查以标记可疑数据来解决。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the primary causes of data loss or inaccuracies in meteorological observations in arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 干旱地区气象观测数据丢失或不准确的主要原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: In meteorological observations in arid regions, data loss or inaccuracies can be caused by missing data points which are marked by -6999, duplication of recorded times, and data that exceed physical significances or instrument ranges. Additionally, doubts about certain data are marked in red, which could indicate potential inaccuracies.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区的气象观测中，数据丢失或不准确可能由以下原因造成：缺失的数据点用 -6999 标记、记录时间的重复以及超出物理意义或仪器范围的数据。此外，某些数据的疑问用红色标记，这可能表示潜在的不准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is there a need for long-term observational datasets in oasis–desert systems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在绿洲-沙漠系统中需要长期观测数据集？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: There is a need for long-term observational datasets in oasis–desert systems to achieve a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange. This understanding is crucial for recognizing oasis–desert interactions, supporting ecological security, and promoting sustainable socioeconomic development in these areas.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，需要长期的观测数据集，以实现对能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解。这种理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用、支持生态安全以及促进这些地区的可持续社会经济发展至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What challenges contribute to the environmental degradation observed in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致干旱和半干旱地区内陆河流流域环境退化的挑战有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges contributing to environmental degradation in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas include the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These issues are particularly prevalent in regions along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin, the Aral Sea basin, and the Lake Urmia basin.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域，导致环境退化的挑战包括河流和湖泊的干涸、自然植被的退化、土地沙漠化的加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些问题在丝绸之路沿线的地区尤为突出，例如塔里木河流域、阿拉尔海流域和乌尔米耶湖流域。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of implementing long-term observational datasets on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中实施长期观测数据集对能量、水蒸气和碳交换的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Implementing long-term observational datasets in oasis–desert ecosystems is crucial for achieving a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange, which supports the ecological stability, socioeconomic development of oases, and helps in recognizing oasis–desert interactions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中实施长期观测数据集对于实现能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解至关重要，这有助于绿洲的生态稳定和社会经济发展，并有助于识别绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the implications of integrating datasets involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from the middle and lower reaches of arid regions for understanding carbon cycles?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 整合来自干旱地区中下游的水文气象、植被和土壤参数的数据，对于理解碳循环的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating datasets involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from arid regions can significantly enhance the understanding of carbon cycles by providing comprehensive data that help in assessing the role of oasis–desert areas as carbon sinks and their impact on the global carbon cycle.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 整合来自干旱地区的水文气象、植被和土壤参数的数据，可以显著增强对碳循环的理解，因为这些综合数据有助于评估绿洲-沙漠地区作为碳汇的作用及其对全球碳循环的影响。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives behind collecting long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集绿洲-沙漠生态系统中长期能源、水汽和碳交换数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives are to understand the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems, which are crucial for achieving the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality. This understanding supports ecological security and sustainable development in oases by recognizing oasis–desert interactions and protecting ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，这对于实现碳达峰和碳中和的目标至关重要。这种理解通过识别绿洲-沙漠相互作用，支持生态安全和可持续发展，保护生态稳定和社会经济发展。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to include detailed hydrometeorological data in datasets related to arid and semiarid regions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在与干旱和半干旱地区相关的数据集中包含详细的水文气象数据是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Including detailed hydrometeorological data is important to address the ecological challenges faced by inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas, such as ecological environment degradation, drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, and intensification of land desertification. These data help in understanding and mitigating these challenges.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 包括详细的水文气象数据对于应对干旱和半干旱地区内陆河流域面临的生态挑战至关重要，例如生态环境退化、河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化以及土地沙漠化加剧。这些数据有助于理解和缓解这些挑战。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What motivates the integration of vegetation and soil parameters with energy and water vapor exchange data in oasis–desert studies?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠研究中，整合植被和土壤参数与能量和水蒸气交换数据的动机是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Integrating vegetation and soil parameters with energy and water vapor exchange data is motivated by the need to provide a comprehensive understanding of the interactions within oasis–desert systems. This integration is significant for recognizing oasis–desert interactions, supporting ecological stability, and facilitating sustainable oasis development by ensuring a balanced ecological environment.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 将植被和土壤参数与能量和水蒸气交换数据相结合的动机在于提供对绿洲-沙漠系统内部相互作用的全面理解。这种整合对于认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用、支持生态稳定以及促进可持续的绿洲发展具有重要意义，从而确保生态环境的平衡。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in ensuring the quality and accuracy of meteorological data collected from automated weather stations in arid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 确保在干旱地区从自动气象站收集的气象数据质量和准确性所涉及的程序有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedures include ensuring a daily collection of 144 data points at 10-minute intervals, marking missing data with -6999, removing duplicate records, deleting data that are physically implausible or exceed instrument range, and marking questionable data in red. Date and time are formatted consistently, and the data is named following a specific rule for identification.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 程序包括确保每天收集144个数据点，间隔10分钟，缺失数据标记为-6999，删除重复记录，删除物理上不合理或超出仪器范围的数据，并将可疑数据标记为红色。日期和时间格式一致，数据按照特定规则命名以便识别。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are the soil parameters and vegetation data incorporated into the analysis of oasis-desert ecosystems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 土壤参数和植被数据是如何融入绿洲-沙漠生态系统分析中的？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Soil parameters such as soil temperature, moisture profiles, and soil heat flux are measured using buried sensors at various depths. These parameters are supplemented along with vegetation data to provide auxiliary information for the comprehensive analysis of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis-desert systems.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 土壤参数如土壤温度、湿度剖面和土壤热通量通过埋入传感器在不同深度进行测量。这些参数与植被数据相结合，为绿洲-沙漠系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的综合分析提供辅助信息。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the technical steps involved in setting up an automated meteorological station in a desert environment to monitor climatic variables?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在沙漠环境中建立自动气象站以监测气候变量涉及哪些技术步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Setting up an automated meteorological station involves installing various sensors at specified heights and orientations, such as air temperature and humidity sensors at 5m and 10m facing north, wind sensors at 5m and 10m, and a rain gauge at 10m. Other sensors include four-component radiometers, infrared thermometers, and soil probes at various depths, all positioned strategically relative to the meteorological tower to capture accurate environmental data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 设置自动气象站涉及在指定高度和方向安装各种传感器，例如在5米和10米处朝北方向安装空气温度和湿度传感器，在5米和10米处安装风速传感器，以及在10米处安装雨量计。其他传感器包括四分量辐射计、红外温度计和不同深度的土壤探头，所有这些传感器都相对于气象塔进行战略性布置，以捕捉准确的环境数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do data processing and quality control procedures ensure the accuracy and reliability of collected data in harsh environments?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序如何确保在恶劣环境中收集数据的准确性和可靠性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Data processing and quality control procedures involve ensuring a consistent number of daily data points, removing duplicate records, deleting data outside physical or instrument limits, marking questionable data, and standardizing data formats to ensure accuracy and reliability.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序涉及确保每天数据点数量的一致性、删除重复记录、删除超出物理或仪器限制的数据、标记可疑数据，以及标准化数据格式以确保准确性和可靠性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What factors enable the integration of long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon flux observations with hydrometeorological and soil parameters?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些因素使得长期能源、水汽和碳通量观测与水文气象和土壤参数的整合成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration is enabled by establishing a network of land surface flux and meteorological stations that consistently collect relevant data, including fluxes and auxiliary hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil parameters, ensuring comprehensive coverage over extended periods.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 集成是通过建立一个陆地表面通量和气象站网络来实现的，该网络持续收集相关数据，包括通量以及辅助的水文气象、植被和土壤参数，确保在较长时间内的全面覆盖。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the anticipated challenges in maintaining data accuracy and consistency when collecting long-term meteorological data in arid and semiarid regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区收集长期气象数据时，维护数据准确性和一致性所面临的预期挑战是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges include ensuring data completeness (144 data points per day), eliminating duplicated records, removing data that exceed physical limits or instrument ranges, and dealing with ecological degradation such as land desertification and dust storms which can impact data collection.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括确保数据完整性（每天144个数据点），消除重复记录，移除超出物理限制或仪器范围的数据，以及应对生态退化，如土地沙漠化和沙尘暴，这些都可能影响数据收集。

Expectation.QuestionEn: How can researchers enhance the reliability of data collected from automatic weather stations in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 研究人员如何提高从绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的自动气象站收集的数据的可靠性？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Reliability can be enhanced by implementing rigorous data processing and quality control procedures, such as standardizing date-time formats, marking questionable data, and following naming conventions for datasets to facilitate data archiving and sharing.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 可靠性可以通过实施严格的数据处理和质量控制程序来增强，例如标准化日期时间格式、标记可疑数据以及遵循数据集的命名约定，以便于数据归档和共享。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What methods can be employed to expand datasets on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert areas to better support sustainable development goals?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 可以采用哪些方法来扩展关于绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据集，以更好地支持可持续发展目标？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Methods include establishing additional land surface flux and meteorological stations, incorporating auxiliary data on vegetation and soil parameters, and integrating data from both artificial and natural systems to provide comprehensive insights into oasis-desert interactions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 方法包括建立额外的地表通量和气象站，结合植被和土壤参数的辅助数据，以及整合来自人工和自然系统的数据，以提供对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的全面洞察。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period for collecting hydrometeorological data in arid regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估在干旱地区使用10分钟平均周期的自动气象站收集水文气象数据的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Automatic weather stations are effective in collecting detailed and frequent hydrometeorological data, such as radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, and air parameters, which are crucial for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid regions like the Heihe River Basin.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 自动气象站在收集详细和频繁的水文气象数据方面非常有效，例如辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面和空气参数，这些数据对于理解像黑河流域这样的干旱地区的能量、水蒸气和碳交换至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in maintaining long-term observational datasets in arid and semiarid regions, and how might they affect data reliability?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区维护长期观测数据集的潜在挑战有哪些，这些挑战可能如何影响数据的可靠性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Potential challenges include ecological degradation, such as drying rivers and lakes, and dust storms, which can disrupt data collection and affect the reliability of long-term datasets. Ensuring data quality requires robust data processing, quality control, and consistent monitoring efforts.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 潜在的挑战包括生态退化，例如河流和湖泊干涸，以及沙尘暴，这可能会干扰数据收集并影响长期数据集的可靠性。确保数据质量需要强有力的数据处理、质量控制和持续的监测工作。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the key considerations for expanding datasets on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert systems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在扩展关于绿洲-沙漠系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据集时，关键考虑因素有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Key considerations include integrating data from various sources, such as remote sensing and field observations, ensuring data consistency and quality control, and addressing ecological impacts on data collection. Collaborating with data centers like the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center can enhance dataset availability and comprehensiveness.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 关键考虑因素包括整合来自各种来源的数据，如遥感和实地观察，确保数据的一致性和质量控制，以及解决数据收集对生态的影响。与国家西藏高原数据中心等数据中心合作可以增强数据集的可用性和全面性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the data collection at different depths for soil temperature and moisture can be accurately maintained and processed over a long period.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何在较长时间内准确维护和处理不同深度的土壤温度和湿度的数据收集。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The data collection involves using soil temperature and moisture sensors buried at various depths (0cm, 2cm, 4cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, 60cm, 100cm) which are positioned strategically around the meteorological tower. Data is collected every 10 minutes, ensuring consistent monitoring. Quality control involves checking for missing data, removing duplicates, and ensuring the data falls within expected physical ranges.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据收集涉及在不同深度（0cm、2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、60cm、100cm）埋设土壤温度和湿度传感器，这些传感器在气象塔周围战略性地布置。数据每10分钟收集一次，确保持续监测。质量控制包括检查缺失数据、删除重复数据，并确保数据在预期的物理范围内。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how the data from different sensors, such as those measuring radiation and soil heat flux, are integrated to study oasis–desert interactions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解如何将来自不同传感器的数据，如辐射和土壤热通量的测量，整合在一起以研究绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The integration of data from sensors measuring various parameters like air temperature, humidity, wind speed, radiation, and soil heat flux is crucial for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges. This comprehensive data collection from automatic weather stations over a long-term period allows for detailed analysis of oasis–desert interactions and supports ecological and socioeconomic assessments.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 传感器测量空气温度、湿度、风速、辐射和土壤热通量等各种参数的数据集成对于理解能量、水汽和碳的交换至关重要。来自自动气象站的长期综合数据收集可以对绿洲-沙漠相互作用进行详细分析，并支持生态和社会经济评估。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the data processing and quality control techniques used in collecting comprehensive meteorological data from automatic weather stations in arid regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 总结在干旱地区从自动气象站收集全面气象数据时使用的数据处理和质量控制技术。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data processing and quality control involved ensuring daily completeness with 144 data entries (one every 10 minutes), marking missing data with -6999, removing duplicate records, deleting data outside of physical or instrumental limits, and marking questionable data in red. It also included standardizing the date and time format, with both included in a single column.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制涉及确保每日完整性，共有144条数据记录（每10分钟一条），缺失数据标记为-6999，删除重复记录，删除超出物理或仪器限制的数据，并将可疑数据标记为红色。还包括标准化日期和时间格式，将两者合并在一个列中。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the methods used for integrating hydrometeorological data with soil and vegetation parameters in oasis–desert ecosystem observations.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析在绿洲-沙漠生态系统观测中，将水文气象数据与土壤和植被参数集成的方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The integration involved using automatic weather stations to observe hydrometeorological data such as radiation, soil heat flux, and temperature profiles, as well as gradients of air temperature, humidity, wind speed, direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture. This was supplemented by additional vegetation and soil parameters to provide a comprehensive dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 集成工作涉及使用自动气象站观察水文气象数据，如辐射、土壤热通量和温度剖面，以及空气温度、湿度、风速、风向、气压、降水和土壤湿度的梯度。这些数据还补充了额外的植被和土壤参数，以提供能量、水蒸气和碳交换的综合数据集。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the challenges faced in maintaining long-term data collection networks in inland river basins of arid and semiarid regions, particularly with respect to ecological environment degradation.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域中，维护长期数据收集网络所面临的挑战，特别是与生态环境退化相关的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges include ecological environment degradation such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These issues are especially prevalent in inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin, Aral Sea basin, and Lake Urmia basin.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括生态环境退化，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些问题在丝绸之路向西的内陆河流流域尤为突出，如塔里木河流域、咸海流域和乌尔米湖流域。
